document_title: Vaginal (private area) dryness: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_name: kho-am-dao.json_4_Signs of vaginal dryness in women
subsection_content:
The most common symptoms of vaginal dryness are:
Vaginal itching and infection: a dry vagina will prevent the resident benign bacteria from living, thereby causing disease-causing bacteria to easily penetrate the private area, causing an uncomfortable itchy feeling, causing Inflammatory conditions with symptoms of green or yellow vaginal discharge that may have a foul odor; In addition, due to the use of inappropriate feminine hygiene solutions or improper hygiene habits, washing too many times a day, douching deep in the vagina creates favorable conditions for harmful bacteria to penetrate and develops, leading to frequent and recurring infections; Vaginal burning and pain during sex: when the vagina is dry, it loses its normal moisture, leading to dryness, heat and burning pain in the vagina. When having sex, the period of foreplay and stimulation before sex is not long enough for enough vaginal fluid to be secreted, causing the vagina to not be lubricated enough, which can cause tissue damage in the vagina leading to bleeding. , hurt.
Vaginal dryness can make women afraid and avoid sexual intercourse because of pain or bleeding
